greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Product_{k>=0} (1 - 1/(2*10^k)).
formula: lim inf Product_{k=0..floor(log_10(n))} floor(n/10^k)*10^k/n for n-->oo.
mathematica: digits = 103; Product[1-1/(2*10^k), {k, 0, Infinity}] // N[#, digits+1]& // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2014 *)
results.author: _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jul 28 2007
